breakfast.name: Chinese Porridge
breakfast.description: Rice porridge with a choice of ground pork, ground turkey, fish, or eggs. Also served with a choice of vegetables such as corn, sweet potatoes, or diced carrots.

breakfast.name: Steamed Buns
breakfast.description: Stuffed or unstuffed steam dumplings with pork/beef or cabbage. Other filling options include shrimp, chicken, or fish. Served with dumpling dipping sauce.

breakfast.name: Breakfast Crepes
breakfast.description: Sweet crepes with the choice of banana, strawberry, or apple fillings. Other stuffings include cheese and ham, chicken, or steak. Optional topping of syrup, jelly, or cream cheese.

lunch.name: Pork Noodles
lunch.description: Fried egg noodles served with pork belly slices with a side of brocolli and soy sauce.

lunch.name: Prawn Noodles
lunch.description: Fried prawn stir-fry dish served with vegetables and a choice of protein including shrimp, pork slices, and egg.

lunch.name: Crayfish Stirfry
lunch.description: Spicy cray fish stiry fry served with slices of pepper. Includes a choice of soy sauce, garlic sauce, or oyster sauce.

dinner.name: Crab Wontons
dinner.description: Hand folded crab wontons with a creamy crab filling, bell peppers, green onions. Served with a spicy plum sauce.

dinner.name: Pork Dumplings
dinner.description: Pan-fried or steamed handmade cabbage pork/shrimp dumplings served with a light chili sauce drizzle.

dinner.name: Dumpling Soup
dinner.description: Steamed dumplings served with carrots, green onions, garlic, and ground ginger sauteed in vegetable and sesame seed oil. All served within a chicken and vegetable broth.
